project.title: Blackhole
project.description: Blackhole is a free-form, avant-garde game that enables players to control particles in unique ways. Individuals explore their own creative design within the art piece, loosely making their own objectives and discovering new ways of controlling this "creative chaos" - a new type of game genre.
project.description_short: Blackhole is a free-form, avant-garde game that enables players to control particles in unique ways. Individuals explore their own creative design within the art piece, loosely making their own objectives and discovering new ways of controlling this "creative chaos".
